Text:
A BIG THANKS FROM ME! This is Fantastic Software.... 
Took me about 10 mins to get familiar with it....
MAKE SURE YOU READ THE READ ME FILE .... ESPECIALLY THE LAST LINE ABOUT CHANGING THE DATE! :)

took 20 mins from start to finish for a straight Dual Layer to Single layer conversion... including  reading DVD, ripping and Writing to blank +-R single layer! - Impressive!
